mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and layout for mobile screens to reduce horizontal scrolling.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider optimizing image sizes and utilizing browser caching to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add meta descriptions and alt text for images, and improve content structure with headers.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by making the booking options more prominent on the homepage.
bookingFlowTip: Ensure a smoother transition between the website and third-party booking platform for better user convenience.
tips: Ensure the website is fully responsive on all devices.
Optimize the website's load time to reduce bounce rates.
Enhance SEO by using better keyword targeting and content optimization.
